body:
Guys,
Sorreh all you guys,
But now I'm seeing obligated to leave Avicus. I joined May 27, 2 days after Avicore update (Avicus 2.0). In another server a guy invited me to play Nexus, he passed me the IP via skype and I joined Avicus. First, I played Nexus, it was beautiful. I felt very good and funny playing here. 2 or 3 days after it, I registered to Avicus website and forums. In that moment, I joined the best community in the world, based on a server and with awesome guys. But, in this community are awesome guys and, other guys....
 I was part of Avicus for a long time, doing that day and day passed, I feel more special and fine in this community. I felt inclusive as a part of the Avicus Family. But days ago I had problems with the school, but, what is so mattering school?! To be honest, my problem wasn't only the school, was my friendships, my relationships, my real family, and all that make us really special.
So, I chose to leave Avicus. I don't know if you noted that for the last 3 or 2 days I wasn't online in-game. But now is the really decision of quit, leave a big community that was very special for me and now I feel this like my family. Understand me, leave Avicus is like leave my real family. But I can't stand it anymore.....
I want to feel special atleast for one moment to these persons who made Avicus perfect for me:
Trident: You was very special for me, you ever supported me and help Avicus, it is important for me. <3
Glitchy: I know that your glitched heart, if you have, will know and understand why I love that you helped so much Avicus Network, good moderator, better person.
Tino: I wish knew you more, but you was a very funny person, isn't matter that if you know me or not.
Juano: Ever recommending, tu siempre sabes lo que decir, aunque no me hieres, so I love you, it doesn't matter. <3 (You understand)
Flo: You are a very good friend, follow being it. You offer me too much support and attention when I cried, you recommended me what do. Thanks for you!
Robo: You was a good person, you obviously are forgetting me, but you have a big soul, use it and be good.
Steven: You always are funny, but at the same time you are helping and doing laugh me, doesn't matter if I am crying or not. <3


And too much more people whom I haven't words to explain my love for they....
Netux
Dooz
Fluey
Peachy
Ducks
Dubby
ParaCow
Ivou
Emmy
Johny
Mooch
Carmel
Nolan :3
fishy
jobo
Cupcake
DoctaRock ^^
And too much more, thank you for giving a so good stay in this community.
